exceptions.tactic: intros d0 d1 tl pl0 pl1 H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl -> pl_tl_length pl0 (lst_length tl) -> pl_tl_length pl1 (lst_length tl) -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u -> reconnaissance d3 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl

Premises:
lst_length = fix lst_length (l : term_list) : nat := match l with | tnil => 0 | tcons _ l' => S (lst_length l') end : term_list -> nat
Inductive term_occur : term -> term -> Prop := to_eq : forall t : term, term_occur t t | to_st : forall (t : term) (a : ad) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_occur t (app a tl) with term_list_occur : term -> term_list -> Prop := tlo_head : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_occur t hd -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl) | tlo_tail : forall (t hd : term) (tl : term_list), term_list_occur t tl -> term_list_occur t (tcons hd tl)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = N : Set
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
preDTA = Map state : Set
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_r a1 s1 (M2 state s
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
pl_produit_rec_0 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit pl0 pl1) n
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
indprinciple_term : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, P t
pl_produit_path_incl_2 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1)
indprinciple_3_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : term -> Prop), (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t
pl_produit_path_incl_1 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1)
pl_produit_path_incl_4 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit pl0 pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1
indprinciple_3_aux = fun n : nat => forall P : term -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (tl : term_list), (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> P u) -> P (app a tl)) -> forall t : term, term_high t <= n -> P t : nat -> Prop Argument scope is [nat_scope]
pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall n m : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_3 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1
pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_3 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_2 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> (exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1) \/ pl_path_incl plp l : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (l : prec_list) (a : ad) (n m : nat), pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length l (S n) \/ l = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (pl1 = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length l (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (l = prec_empty -> pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l = prec_empty)) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
term_occur_def_1 = fun t : term_list => forall u : term, term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t : term_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d la tl -> pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_rec_length_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d la tl -> liste_rec_length_def d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
pl_tl_length_rec_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d la tl -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
term_occur_def_0 = fun t : term => forall u : term, term_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high t : term -> Prop
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0...
liste_rec_length_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, liste_reconnait d pl tl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_rec_6 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> n = lst_length tl
liste_rec_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (d : preDTA) (n : nat), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> n = lst_length tl
term_occur_1 : forall (t : term_list) (u : term), term_list_occur u t -> term_high u <= term_high_0 t
pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => forall n : nat, pl_tl_length_rec_def_0 n -> pl_tl_length pl (S n) -> liste_reconnait d pl tl -> S n = lst_length tl : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_recon_ind : forall P : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d tnil pl_path_nil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> P d tl plp -> P d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (t : term_list) (p0 : pl_path), pl_path_recon p t p0 -> P p t p0

``` 
intros d0 d1 tl pl0 pl1 H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11.
apply rec_consi with (hd := app a tl).
- apply H6.
- apply H7.
- apply H4.
- apply H5.
Qed.
